name: Kyyrah
content:
Kyyrah, also known as the Jewel of Xo, was a male Sith who was part of the Infernal Council, a group of Sith enslaved by the Rakata warlord Soa and imprisoned with him in the Eternity Vault on the planet Belsavis.
Kyyrah, Jewel of Xo appears as one of the enemies in the Infernal Council boss encounter in the "Eternity Vault" Operation in the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. Kyyrah only appears in the sixteen-man difficulty modes of the operation.
